channel.title: ARIMA on Nithin Premkumar
channel.description: Recent content in ARIMA on Nithin Premkumar

item.title: Project 2: Predicting VIX Index
item.description: Final Year Undergraduate Project, worked individually to find an appropriate traditional Statistical Model to predict future VIX values. The data set contains information from 1990, February 01 to 2021, December 13. Followed the Box-Jenkins method to find the appropriate p, d, and q values for ARIMA model. Points to improve: Model was not able to predict the sudden fluctuations due to external factors. Could have implemented a Deep Learning Model in addition to achieve a better result.
